select cmt_seq.nextval from dual
insert into commute(cmt_no,emp_no) values(#{cmtNo},#{empNo})
mapper.select: select cmt.* from (select * from commute where emp_no=#{empNo} order by cmt_no desc) cmt where rownum<2

select count(*) from cmtView
where to_char(cmt_in, 'yyyy-mm-dd')=#{startDay}

select to_char(cmt_in,'mm') as "CMTIN",count(*) as "TOTAL" from cmtView where to_char(cmt_in,'yyyy')=to_char(sysdate,'yyyy') and emp_no=#{empNo} group by to_char(cmt_in, 'mm') order by to_char(cmt_in, 'mm')
